testsuite.name: Customer Repository Tests

testcase.name: Test External Sort by Name (Natural Order)
Order 'asc': Expect [Anna Apple, Ivan Zebra, Petro Borets]
Order 'desc': Expect [Petro Borets, Ivan Zebra, Anna Apple]
Order 'invalid_input': Expect [Anna Apple, Ivan Zebra, Petro Borets]
Test External Sort by Address Length
Stream: Get all full names uppercase
